ゲームとしてはルールは単純で分かりやすく面白い
ただよくレビューで見かける民度が低いとかルール、マナーが守れていないとか気にして許せないなら
このような対人ゲームはしない方が良い
どうしてもサバイバー目線のコメントが多いのでトンネルやキャンプはルール違反という意見もあるが
キラーからすると状況によってはそれが戦略であったりもするので一概に悪いとは言えない
そもそもホラーゲームなんで色んな状況を楽しむ気持ちでなければ楽しめない

Surement un des plus gros jeux en terme de contenu depuis ces dernières années. Bugué mais liés à des problèmes surement à l'intérieur du code principal (il faut savoir faire avec) .Multijoueur vraiment sympa et de plus en plus complet, la mise à jour incluant ''the rift'' est absolument réussie.

2000 heures se sont ajoutées au compteur, ce jeu reste mon préféré de ces dernières années. Ces mauvais côtés font que je déteste ce jeu autant que je l'aime. La majorité des bugs détruisant le jeu ont été balayé, aujourd'hui ne reste plus que quelques erreurs rares mais toujours drôles ou frustrantes. 
Tueur ou Survivant, votre histoire d'amour avec DBD vous attend.
this game is amazing. tough for beginners and terrible matchmaking system but once u get the hang of it, the game play is really engaging and exciting!
very cool game.

This is one of the most entertaining asymmetric PvP games I've ever played. This game is fantastic; it's just coded in Linguini (tm). I regularly crash out of lobbies with no error message, losing rank progress and whatever items i bring with me. Fix your game and I fix my review :)

I've been playing DBD now for a few years.  Although it's had it's ups and downs, I feel like the developers are always working to improve the game and are consistently not only adding new and fun content, but are coming up with creative ways to make the game even deeper, richer and more complex.  This recent addition with The Archives and The Rift are very fun to play with and I have enjoyed playing with the community.  I look forward to many more fun years with the devs, and the community.

(Feb 2021)
Although the 4.5 patch was rough going and tremendously led to a bunch of negative reviews (including myself), now that the 4.5.2 patch is out, almost everything wrong with the game is now fixed and has improved tremendously.  Thank you to the Devs for working diligently and expeditiously on getting this patch out.  The game is back on track and a joy to play again!
Awesome game. I prefer being the killer over survivors but great game.

Died a lot. It's legit

雖然是對抗性的遊戲，整體氣氛做得不錯，
尤其是Michael Myers真的很有迫力，被嚇尿和追殺時真的很恐怖，
他的臉真的很白，很可怕...
媽的!! 我已經幾天睡覺都夢到被他拿大菜刀追了...(永一不能躲)

...咳咳，總而言之就是一款很有可玩性的遊戲，不知不覺就會沉迷多個小時，
那些給了負評不停嘴很多bug很不平衡很垃圾的玩家也繼續不停玩，
雖然人類每場都是修發電機躲鬼，殺手則追斬掛等單調行為，
人類可透過使用不同技能組合和道具玩出完全不同風格的玩法，
殺手也一樣並可借助主導權嘗試不同戰略，很可玩~
總之有友人一起時可以做逃生者一起邊聊天吹水邊虐鬼，
寂寞夜深時也能單人玩殺手被虐，可謂不對稱對抗遊戲的好處，

遊戲没有永遠赢家和輸家，技術再高者也一樣，
輸了就開下一場再來玩過，技術不足就再思考鍛練，
系统也一樣没有絕對公平和完美，與其想多多何不享受下當中的快樂，
遊戲是一件很快樂的事。
dbd是一個人物設計和玩法做得不錯的遊戲，希望新玩家也能好好體驗它的優秀之處。
Muy entretenido, pasas horas de juego farmeando y jugando con los amigos
good game

Stupid game, stupid people, stupid ranking system, stupid game mechanics, stupid cosmetics, waste of my time, waste of your time, waste of my money, waste of your money, but I still play this garbage religiously. Would I recommend? Yea.

DeadByDaylight, or DbD for short, takes you and friends into "Trials." Each of these trials is to complete your objectives to escape, but, you will be followed by one of the many Killers that have been added to the game. With dozens of Survivors and Killers alike, you'll find plenty of different ways to play. There's play styles for solo players, supportive players, and even for Survivors to go on the offense by attacking the Killer's belongings; such as hooks, traps, or totems. It's immersive to see that each realm The Entity warps you and your group to is sculpted in a way that changes constantly. Even doing so by bringin the Killers' preferred area along with them. If you want a fun game to play with friends, or to kill your friends with, this is definitely it.

I'm a huge fan of asymmetric multiplayer games. I got this game for free on PS4 and after playing two rounds I was intrigued. Then it was on sale for ten bucks and I decided to pick it up on here. No regerts. So far some of the hunters seem to be a little unbalanced and better than others, but overall this game is a blast to play on both teams.

UPDATE: After reaching almost 400 hours played, this game keeps reeling me back in. It's an imperfect but well thought out competitive game that the developers constantly update. Very impressed with the recent visual rework of levels that brings the game into the next gen.

Dead by daylight is in its first few hours a game of tension and fear as you learn to face against the killers of the entity. As the game becomes more familiar and you learn the various techniques to deal with the killer, it loses most of its scariness, but gains high replayability. This is a game that has a good level of strategy to it, and a lot of mindgames - getting into the head(s) of your opponent(s). The game very much is buggy, but I can deal with it just for its level of fun alone.

Im not gonna lie, I really like this game! However, I feel like this is more of a game to be best enjoyed when playing with friends to be honest. Not saying playing with randoms is a bad thing, Sometimes I've met some really cool people... and of course the tryhard trolls. Its just that playing with friends seems more fun in my opinion.
Daddy by daylight is a fantastic game about unruly kids running away from their responsibilities, while their inner demons remind them of all their mistakes.

The Good things about this game is that it has good graphics and that its a very fun game to play with friends but gives a more challenge when playing by your self and sometimes gives u jump scares. Its also, a game that takes time to get good at and get to mind game people.
The only bad things about this game is that there are a lot of salty people (either from other survivors or killers). Also, sometimes bad lag or rarely good lag (depending on what ur doing in the game. lol)

怎么说呢，玩多了就容易腻，然后停一段时间再下回来玩就又觉得好玩了，有朋友的时候也很好玩的，但是遇到猪队友就没办法了，我一个人物都没升满50呢，呜呜呜

Update: At this point i only watch others play. The company still refuses to care about it's player base and control the toxicity. You would have so many more players if you learned how to do this. Behaviour Interactive....just a disappointing company. It's not hard to create a proper reporting/text blocking feature that works.

Update: Player base is getting more toxic - I'd like to see more control over at the very least language allowed to be entered into chats. One guy was harassing the killer after his entire team won using every offensive word he could think of. I will not be playing DBD again any time soon after watching this. I have no interest in being part of that type of community.

To review this is really hard cuz it CAN be really fun. It's definitely made for killers so when you play survivor 80% of the time it really won't be any fun, even being on a team of energetic fun people can only do so much. Playing killer can also be frustrating due to the server problems(after they activated dedicated servers) it can take 20 minutes sometimes longer to find a match cuz I assume everyone is trying to play killer so there aren't enough survivors to go around? It would be nice to see the obviously overpowered killers get a nerf. Either the sound is not implemented well or legit need to make some killers more noticeable. I've watched lots of people, i've played with lots of people, I haven't had it for really long at all but i'm already feeling the depression of boredom set in. More dailies needed(at the very least you should be loading 2 per 24hr cycle). Due to the imbalance, the legit lack of fun on most survivor matches, stupid long match making, i can't recommend this game to anyone at this time....and it's been out forever getting updates already...gotta think of something other than adding characters/killers, let's go here.
